reports.title: name="Tomb Raider" appid="203160" target_framerate="40-49 FPS title="Steam Deck - Prefer Battery Life"

data.game_display_settings:
#### BASIC

- **RESOLUTION:** 1280x800
- **V-SYNC:** OFF
- **FULLSCREEN:** ON
- **EXCLUSIVE FULLSCREEN:** ON
- **MOTION BLUR:** ON
- **SCREEN EFFECTS:** ON

#### ADVANCED

- **TEXTURE QUALITY:** ULTRA
- **TEXTURE FILTER:** ANISOTROPIC 4x
- **HAIR QUALITY:** NORMAL
- **ANTI_ALIASING:** FXAA
- **SHADOWS:** ULTRA
- **SHADOW RESOLUTION:** HIGH
- **LEVEL OF DETAIL:** ULTRA
- **REFLECTIONS:** HIGH
- **DEPTH OF FIELD:** ULTRA
- **SSAO:** ULTRA
- **POST PROCESSING:** ON
- **TESSELLATION:** ON
- **HIGH PRECISION:** ON
data.additional_notes:
This all comes down to the hair. If you want TRESSFX, you need to give it everything.

I also ran this with `build743.0 - TR Build 1.01.743.0` selected in the **Beta Participation** of the **SteamOS Game Properties**. This was supposed to fix some HUD issues.

Enable **Gyro To Joystick Camera [Beta]** in the game controller settings. I set this to have **L2** as the Activation button so it only worked when aiming the bow or gun.
